scenes.description: MC section after the song performance.

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: Hey, hey! Come on, dance!
subtitles.english: Hey, hey! Come on, dance!

subtitles.original: Wow!
subtitles.english: Wow!

subtitles.original:
金曜日のおはよう
HoneyWorks feat. Gero
subtitles.english:
Friday's Good Morning
HoneyWorks feat. Gero

subtitles.original: おはようのオーディションして
subtitles.english: I practice my "Good Morning" audition

subtitles.original: 髪型もバッチリOK
subtitles.english: My hair is also perfectly OK

subtitles.original: 金曜日は頑張らなくちゃ
subtitles.english: I have to do my best on Friday

subtitles.original: だって二日会えないからね
subtitles.english: Because I won't see you for two days

subtitles.original: 8時0分 2両目
subtitles.english: 8:00 AM, the second train car

subtitles.original: お気に入りの特等席
subtitles.english: My favorite special seat

subtitles.original: 隣の人は眠そうですね
subtitles.english: The person next to me looks sleepy

subtitles.original: そんな日常
subtitles.english: That's my daily life

subtitles.original: 8時7分開くのは
subtitles.english: Opening at 8:07

subtitles.original: 向かいのドア 息を呑む
subtitles.english: The opposite door, I hold my breath

subtitles.original: 言いかけてたその言葉は
subtitles.english: The words I was about to say

subtitles.original: 今日も逃げた
subtitles.english: Escaped again today

subtitles.original: きっかけシンプルでいいのに
subtitles.english: The trigger should be simple enough

subtitles.original: 意気地ないな
subtitles.english: I have no courage

subtitles.original: 勇気のテスト乗り越えなきゃ
subtitles.english: I have to pass the test of courage

subtitles.original: 逃げるな自分
subtitles.english: Don't run away, me

subtitles.original: おはようのオーディションして
subtitles.english: I practice my "Good Morning" audition

subtitles.original: 弱虫な自分に勝って
subtitles.english: Winning over my cowardly self

subtitles.original: 金曜日は頑張らなくちゃ
subtitles.english: I have to do my best on Friday

subtitles.original: だって二日会えないからね
subtitles.english: Because I won't see you for two days

subtitles.original: 眠そうな君を見てる
subtitles.english: I'm looking at you looking sleepy

subtitles.original: それだけで満足しちゃって
subtitles.english: Just that makes me satisfied

subtitles.original: だめだって頑張らなくちゃ
subtitles.english: I can't do that, I have to do my best

subtitles.original: そっと声に出してみた
subtitles.english: I tried to say it softly

subtitles.original: 8時0分 2両目
subtitles.english: 8:00 AM, the second train car

subtitles.original: 座られてた特等席
subtitles.english: My special seat was taken

subtitles.original: ついてないな空模様まで
subtitles.english: I'm not lucky, even the weather

subtitles.original: 泣きそうです
subtitles.english: Looks like it's going to cry

subtitles.original: 8時7分準備まだ
subtitles.english: 8:07 AM, I'm not ready yet

subtitles.original: ちょっと待ってドキドキが
subtitles.english: Wait a second, my heart is racing

subtitles.original: 震え混じりその言葉は
subtitles.english: Those words, mixed with trembling

subtitles.original: かき消された
subtitles.english: Were drowned out

subtitles.original: 雨宿り立ち尽くす僕に
subtitles.english: To me, standing still taking shelter from the rain

subtitles.original: 「傘をどうぞ」
subtitles.english: "Here, have an umbrella"

subtitles.original: 君は少し恥ずかしそうに
subtitles.english: You, looking a little embarrassed

subtitles.original: 下を向いた
subtitles.english: Looked down

subtitles.original: 「ありがとう」震えていた
subtitles.english: "Thank you", it was trembling

subtitles.original: 練習してない言葉
subtitles.english: The words I hadn't practiced

subtitles.original: 言えたから頑張らなくちゃ
subtitles.english: Since I said them, I have to do my best

subtitles.original: だって二日会えないからね
subtitles.english: Because I won't see you for two days

subtitles.original: 大好きな君を見てる
subtitles.english: I'm looking at you whom I love

subtitles.original: それだけで満足しちゃって
subtitles.english: Just that makes me satisfied

subtitles.original: 月曜日も頑張らなくちゃ
subtitles.english: I have to do my best on Monday too

subtitles.original: そっと声に出してみた
subtitles.english: I tried to say it softly

subtitles.original: 夢では自然に話せるのに
subtitles.english: In my dreams, I can talk normally

subtitles.original: 勇気のテスト乗り越えるから
subtitles.english: I'll pass the test of courage

subtitles.original: 少し待ってて
subtitles.english: So wait for me a bit

subtitles.original: おはようのオーディションして
subtitles.english: I practice my "Good Morning" audition

subtitles.original: 髪型もバッチリOK
subtitles.english: My hair is also perfectly OK

subtitles.original: 8時7分に君を待ってる
subtitles.english: I'm waiting for you at 8:07

subtitles.original: だって今日は言えるから
subtitles.english: Because today I can say it

subtitles.original: おやすみも言いたいけれど
subtitles.english: I want to say "Good Night" too, but

subtitles.original: ちょっと待って大好きな
subtitles.english: Wait a second, my favorite

subtitles.original: 言葉なんだって君に会えるからね
subtitles.english: Words, because I can see you

subtitles.original: Alright everybody! How was that?
subtitles.english: Alright everybody! How was that?

subtitles.original: Did you like the previous songs?
subtitles.english: Did you like the previous songs?

subtitles.original: It was "Zetsubigaku" from Matsuura Aya,
subtitles.english: It was "Zetsubigaku" from Matsuura Aya,

subtitles.original: and "Kinyoubi no Ohayou" from HoneyWorks, yeah!
subtitles.english: and "Kinyoubi no Ohayou" from HoneyWorks, yeah!

subtitles.original: Um, especially the "Zetsubigaku"
subtitles.english: Um, especially the "Zetsubigaku"

subtitles.original: I was really excited to perform for you guys
subtitles.english: I was really excited to perform for you guys

subtitles.original: because it's a Hello! Project song
subtitles.english: because it's a Hello! Project song

subtitles.original: that probably a lot of you guys don't know,
subtitles.english: that probably a lot of you guys don't know,

subtitles.original: but did you like it? Did you like it? Did you like it?
subtitles.english: but did you like it? Did you like it? Did you like it?

subtitles.original: It's pretty cool. Yeah.
subtitles.english: It's pretty cool. Yeah.

subtitles.original: Matsuura Aya is good!
subtitles.english: Matsuura Aya is good!

subtitles.original: So, next up, we will have more guests,
subtitles.english: So, next up, we will have more guests,

subtitles.original: more guests, more guests!
subtitles.english: more guests, more guests!
